report_title: KJET Kilifi County Application Ranking and Evaluation

S1_Registration_Track_Record_5%.reason: Registered, but low and unstable turnover suggests recent operations (Score 3).

S2_Financial_Position_20%.reason: Turnover (120,000 KES in 2024) and bank balance (KES 756) are minimal/irregular (Score 1).

S3_Market_Demand_Competitiveness_20%.reason: Strong potential markets (local village producers, urban/institutional buyers) and clear cooling/processing plan (Score 4).

S4_Business_Proposal_Viability_25%.reason: Clear problem/solution, quantified targets (e.g., 500L/day Year 1), detailed execution and co-investment readiness (Score 5).

S5_Value_Chain_Alignment_10%.reason: Priority VC (Dairy processing/cooling); fills a critical node (aggregation/cooling) to upgrade the value chain (Score 5).

S6_Inclusivity_Sustainability_20%.reason: Strong gender/youth participation goals (70% youth goal) and multiple green practices planned (Solar, Water Harvesting, Fodder) (Score 4).

S1_Registration_Track_Record_5%.reason: Registered since 2015 (>3 years), but financial activity shows a heavy reliance on grants/donations rather than commercial track record (Score 4).

S2_Financial_Position_20%.reason: Turnover dropped from KES 3.9M (2023) to KES 1.4M (2024), showing instability; 2023 revenue was largely donation-based (Score 2).

S3_Market_Demand_Competitiveness_20%.reason: Regular sales channels (hotels/restaurants, direct sales) and known competitors, meets basic demand evidence (Score 3).

S4_Business_Proposal_Viability_25%.reason: Clear direction (procurement targets for coconuts), but targets are generic and budget is rough/unclear on execution details (Score 3).

S5_Value_Chain_Alignment_10%.reason: Priority VC (Edible Oils); clear value-addition role (processing) with documented linkages (members are farmers) (Score 5).

S6_Inclusivity_Sustainability_20%.reason: No specific green practices mentioned in detail; low inclusion of sustainability evidence (Score 2).

ineligible_applicants.reason: Value Chain (Agriculture/Fresh Produce) is not a designated Priority or Additional Value Chain as per the KJET rules.
